characters: Driver of a white sedan, driver of a van, motorcyclist
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a busy urban road. A white sedan is seen ahead, and a van is driving closely behind it. A motorcyclist is also present on the right side of the road. The white sedan suddenly accelerates and crashes into a pole, causing a dramatic scene.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is maintaining a consistent speed while navigating through the urban road. The driver is likely cautious due to the presence of multiple vehicles and a motorcyclist. The sudden acceleration and crash of the white sedan ahead may prompt the driver to decelerate or stop to avoid any potential collision.
key_objects: 1) Front: A white sedan, approximately 10 meters away, suddenly accelerates and crashes into a pole. 2) Right: A motorcyclist, approximately 5 meters away, driving steadily. 3) Rear: A van, approximately 3 meters away, driving closely behind the white sedan.

actions: The self-driving vehicle is maintaining a consistent speed while following the white van ahead. The motorcyclist on the right side starts moving forward, which may require the vehicle to adjust its speed or direction.
